MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in St Margaret Street and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:35pm due to faulty electrical equipment. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional equipment required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:35pm on Monday, 07 December 2020.
